backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles, portfolios, and Yahoo Finance data fetching via http outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing enforced light‑mode requirements and related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions with full light/dark OKLCH variable sets and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling public vs authenticated routes and enforcing forced light mode on unauthenticated screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/Allocatio: Recharts donut chart computing holding values and rendering allocation with legend and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/charts/Performan: Recharts line chart fetching historical data per selected range to show portfolio performance.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with a top nav, toggleable sidebar, and responsive content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Displays portfolios with live metrics and navigation, plus a dialog for creating new portfolios.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the fixed top navigation bar with logo, portfolio switcher, ticker search, theme toggle, and login.
frontend/src/components/market/LastUpdat: Shows a live-updating timestamp indicating how many seconds ago data was refreshed.
frontend/src/components/market/TickerTyp: Provides a searchable ticker input with debounced API queries, dropdown results, and keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AddEdi: Modal for adding or editing a holding with ticker search, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Create: Dialog for creating a new portfolio with name input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Delete: Confirmation dialog to delete a portfolio and navigate home after completion.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Holdin: Renders a holdings table with metrics, live/override pricing, and edit/remove actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Displays a portfolio summary card with value, daily changes, sparkline chart, and navigation to the portfolio view.
Allows toggling portfolio public visibility and provides a shareable public URL with copy support.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Remove: Confirmation dialog for removing a holding, performing the mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/theme/PublicThem: Theme provider forcing light mode for public pages without system preference detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: Fetches live quotes, ticker search results, and handles both Yahoo Finance and crypto sources with caching and parsing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioSimulatio: Manages simulation state for portfolio pricing, including toggles, global moves, and per-ticker overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating portfolios and holdings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme persistence and toggling using local storage and root CSS classes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, global styles, and design tokens.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioMath.ts: Computes holding and portfolio metrics such as market value, returns, and daily changes using quote data.
frontend/src/lib/simulationQuotes.ts: Generates simulated quote data based on live quotes and simulation parameters like global moves and overrides.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Contains crypto ID mapping, symbol utilities, and parsers for Yahoo Finance and CoinGecko responses.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the list of user portfolios with live quotes and loading states on the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Shows detailed portfolio metrics, charts, holdings, and simulation controls with data from live or simulated quotes.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPortfolioPage.t: Displays a public portfolio with live or simulated quotes, portfolio metrics, charts, and holdings, with simulation controls and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/TickerPreviewPage.tsx: Shows live and historical price data for a given ticker, including current pricing, crypto detection, and a 30‑day line chart.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin integration for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to enforcing light mode on public pages.
